# Spring Shine Events - Event Management Website

This is a Next.js website for Spring Shine Events, a professional event management company.

## Project Context
- Modern event management website with portfolio showcase
- Built with Next.js 15, React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS
- Focus on visual appeal, user experience, and mobile responsiveness

## Code Style Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all components
- Follow React best practices with functional components and hooks
- Use Tailwind CSS for styling
- Implement responsive design (mobile-first approach)
- Add smooth animations and transitions for better UX
- Optimize images and assets for performance

## Component Structure
- Keep components modular and reusable
- Use proper TypeScript types and interfaces
- Follow Next.js App Router conventions
- Implement SEO best practices with metadata

## Design Principles
- Clean, modern, and professional design
- Spring-themed color palette (soft pastels with bright accents)
- High-quality imagery for events showcase
- Clear call-to-actions throughout the site
- Easy navigation and user-friendly forms
